name: Uber Driver Simulator
description:
Earn money by transporting passengers where they want to go with many car options, modification of your cars and many different ways of making money. Enjoy the ride by buying new vehicles with the money you earn.

The Uber simulator gives you the feeling of using an uber. Drop the passengers to the specified point. Buy new vehicles with the money you earn from the passengers and gifts you get. More than 10 color options. More than 7 vehicles and a constantly updated game. If you want more, please specify in the comments.

In this uber simulator, you start the game with the vehicle you had at the beginning. You accumulate money and get faster and stronger vehicles. Download the game now.
This game offers you fast vehicles, driving pleasure, and a good time with your family and friends. As your vehicle gets damaged, your damage panel starts to turn gray. When you are completely damaged, you return to the vehicle selection screen. With the increasingly difficult game mode, it addresses every segment from 7 to 70.
